catalog_info.title: Senior Tutorial: Honors Thesis in Psychology
catalog_info.notes: Required of and limited to senior psychology concentrators in the general    psychology Honors-eligible thesis track.
catalog_info.prereq: Recommended: Approved thesis application and Psychology 1901.
catalog_info.description: Individual supervised thesis research supplemented with occasional group meetings to discuss major aspects of the thesis process (e.g., organizing, conducting, and presenting research). Graded Sat/Unsat. Prospectus meeting required for fall term credit, as well as a paper for students who divide course at mid-year. Submission of thesis required for full year credit.  Part one of a two part series.
